tweets.content:
Cool feature just dropped for 
@SuperGrok
 subscribers. 

Turn on Companions in settings.
Next I’m buying Coca-Cola to put the cocaine back in
I hope that even my worst critics remain on Twitter, because that is what free speech means
The future is gonna be so

summary: @SuperGrok has a new feature called "Companion". Turn it on and you get more friends! 😃👍🏼🚀😍 #supergrk  #supergrkcompanion #friendship #friends 😊😂😘😘 ;)  #friendshipgoals
